snippet: People in the United States pay more and get less than citizens in other advanced countries.
abstract: Editorial contends report released by Commonwealth Fund shows why the health care reform law is so necessary; notes report found that Americans fare poorly compared with people in other advanced countries by virtually all measures concerning health care; maintains Affordable Care Act, however imperfect, is needed to fix the dysfunctional American health care system.
